title: [ 我都要攬炒！Email已出！！ ]  一人一信 強烈要求 美國及英國政府 向香港發出 第四級旅遊警示！！！

replies.msg:
美國：
acshk@state.gov

Dear US Consul General in Hong Kong,

We are a group of concerned Hong Kong citizens writing to strongly urge US Travel Advisory to issue Level 4 – Do Not Travel to Hong Kong to alert US citizens. Hong Kong is NOT a safe place for ANY citizens to travel to. Crime and Terrorism are evident last night in Yuen Long, Hong Kong. While Yuen Long is not a popular travel destination to tourists, it carries attractions and it is worrying that such criminal and violent act will spread across the city.
It is already well known globally in the past weeks that Hong Kong Government and Police Force have been attacking peaceful protestors, press, social workers and Christian pastors with tear gas and bullets.
On 21st July 2019, the undemocratic act of Hong Kong Government has further escalated. Hong Kong Police Force and Legislative Councilor Junius Ho Kwan-Yiu have organized an inside job with triad members of Yuen Long to attack normal civilians.
As the tragic unveiled last night, triad members in white t-shirts entered Yuen Long West Rail MTR station and started attacking everyone, including press, pregnant woman, families commuting, elderly, etc. The police emergency call center refused to pick up calls from civilians as opposed to the usual 9-second pick up policy and HUNG UP on civilians’ calls. Police present at the station WALKED AWAY from the crime scene and some arrived 60 minutes later as opposed to the ususal 15-minutes arrival policy. The triad members have already left just before the police arrived.
Later the night, the police has announced that they did not see any people holding weapons. It was all caught on tape that there were a lot of gang members holding metal or wooden sticks and knifes.
Just before the bloodshed, Hong Kong Legislative Councilor was found shaking hands and walking along with triad members on the streets of Yuen Long. They have also thrown Mr. Ho a thumbs up and said he is a hero. Ho has also said thank you and “appreciate all your efforts” in Cantonese in return.
This is an UNACCEPTABLE terrorist act towards innocent civilians and an organized crime between the police the government. It is an unfortunate that Hong Kong is facing an unprecedented challenge since 1997 and it is disappointing that the government has resorted to such violent and inhuman measures to their political turmoil and incompetence.
Please see appendix for all the relevant evidence as support.
We appreciate your consideration.
Thank you.
Sincerely,


Copy: US Travel Advisory



Appendix:
Video of a gang of men dressed in white t-shirts entered Yuen Long West Rail Station and beat up citizens in the station area, in the paid station area, and even in the train compartment. (July 21, 2019)
https://www.facebook.com/standnewshk/videos/407353793207073/
Video of gang members attacking Stand News HK journalist (July 21, 2019)
https://www.facebook.com/standnewshk/videos/477630836335546
Image of Junius Ho Kwan-Yiu walking and chatting with gang members
https://www.facebook.com/nextmagazinefansclub/videos/2320755911338882/
The man who greeted Mr. Ho and the man whose hand Mr. Ho shook were each captured in the videos taken in the Yuen Long West Rail Station as members of the gang who beat up ordinary citizens, as below:-



This is also reported in Apple Daily. The report is accessible online and a copy thereof is enclosed hereto.

英國：
hongkong.consular@fco.gov.uk


Dear UK Foreign and Commonwealth Office,
We are a group of concerned Hong Kong citizens writing to strongly urge UK Foreign Travel Advice to issue notice to UK citizens AGAINST traveling to Hong Kong. Hong Kong is currently NOT a safe place for ANY citizens to travel to. Crime and Terrorism are evident last night in Yuen Long, Hong Kong. While Yuen Long is not a popular travel destination to tourists, it carries attractions and it is worrying that such criminal and violent act will spread across the city.
It is already well known globally in the past weeks that Hong Kong Government and Police Force have been attacking peaceful protestors, press, social workers and Christian pastors with tear gas and bullets.
On 21st July 2019, the undemocratic act of Hong Kong Government has further escalated. Hong Kong Police Force and Legislative Councilor Junius Ho Kwan-Yiu have organized an inside job with triad members of Yuen Long to attack normal civilians.
As the tragic unveiled last night, triad members in white t-shirts entered Yuen Long West Rail MTR station and started attacking everyone, including press, pregnant woman, families commuting, elderly, etc. The police emergency call center refused to pick up calls from civilians as opposed to the usual 9-second pick up policy and HUNG UP on civilians’ calls. Police present at the station WALKED AWAY from the crime scene and some arrived 60 minutes later as opposed to the ususal 15-minutes arrival policy. The triad members have already left just before the police arrived.
Later the night, the police has announced that they did not see any people holding weapons. It was all caught on tape that there were a lot of gang members holding metal or wooden sticks and knifes.
Just before the bloodshed, Hong Kong Legislative Councilor was found shaking hands and walking along with triad members on the streets of Yuen Long. They have also thrown Mr. Ho a thumbs up and said he is a hero. Ho has also said thank you and “appreciate all your efforts” in Cantonese in return.
This is an UNACCEPTABLE terrorist act towards innocent civilians and an organized crime between the police the government. It is an unfortunate that Hong Kong is facing an unprecedented challenge since 1997 and it is disappointing that the government has resorted to such violent and inhuman measures to their political turmoil and incompetence.
Please see appendix for all the relevant evidence as support.
We appreciate your consideration.
Thank you.
Sincerely,


Copy: UK Foreign Travel Advice, UK Consulate General Hong Kong



Appendix
Video of a gang of men dressed in white t-shirts entered Yuen Long West Rail Station and beat up citizens in the station area, in the paid station area, and even in the train compartment. (July 21, 2019)
